overview: Examines the resilience of residents who are profoundly overlooked by media representations and wider social responses. Interweaving intimate portraits with the residents' own historical re-enactments, landscape and architectural studies and dramatised scenes, the film asks how we might resist being framed exclusively through class, gender, ability or disability, and even through geography.
tagline: A film forged by community, a spirited celebration of extraordinary everyday humanity
title: Estate, a Reverie
